old: よし、その調子で修練を重ねろよ！
speaker: Wilson

old:
技は一日にしてならず！
ひとつひとつ身に付けていくんだ
column2: Skill does not come in a day! You have to learn each one step by step.
speaker: Wilson

old:
訓練にやりすぎはないぞ
じっくり実戦前に稽古していけ！
column2: There's no such thing as too much training. Take your time and practice before the actual battle!
speaker: Wilson

old: おう、訓練について質問か？
column2: Oh, do you have any questions about the training?
speaker: Wilson
